message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great product for $9,500. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,500. Can you meet me at that price?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but the product is quite valuable and I can't go as low as $8,500.  How about we meet in the middle at $9,000?
I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. Would you be willing to go down to $8,750?
